about.summary: Set of common functions used for manipulating colors, detecting and interacting with 'RStudio', modeling, formatting, determining users' operating system, feature scaling, and more!
Set of common functions used for manipulating colors, detecting and interacting with 'RStudio', modeling, formatting, determining users' operating system, feature scaling, and more!

name: r-jjb
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-jjb
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/jjb_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/jjb/jjb_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 49d9379cfd8c9320b6f60fb4386ee6e6ddb03ca9b2d0bf5df8cf76f3bedd3e79

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('jjb')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('jjb')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/coatless/jjb

  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Set of common functions used for manipulating colors, detecting and interacting with
    'RStudio', modeling, formatting, determining users' operating system, feature scaling,
    and more!

  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - coatless
